SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_alarm_list AS a WHERE a.DeleteDate IS NULL AND a.UserCode = #{userID} AND a.IsNew IS NULL AND a.ReceivedDate > DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL -14 DAY)
AND ReservedInt1 is null
AND ReservedInt1 = -1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.ProcessID FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Process AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Workitem AS B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Performer AS C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE C.UserCode = #{userID} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019') AND C.State = 1 AND B.State = 288 AND A.ProcessState = 288 AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT A.ProcessID FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Process AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Workitem AS B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Performer AS C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE B.DeputyID = #{userID} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017') AND C.State = 1 AND B.State = 288 AND A.ProcessState = 288 AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL
) AS ApprovalList

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( # 개인일정만 SELECT E.EventID, E.FolderType FROM covi_smart4j.EVENT AS E LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.EVENT_DATE AS ED ON E.EventID = ED.EventID INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER AS FD ON E.FolderID = FD.FolderID AND FD.FolderType = 'Schedule.Person' AND FD.DeleteDate IS NULL WHERE LEFT(#{localCurrentDate}, 10) BETWEEN ED.StartDate AND ED.EndDate
AND E.FolderID IN
#{item}
AND E.DeleteDate IS NULL AND E.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND (E.RegisterCode = #{userID} OR E.OwnerCode = #{userID} )
UNION ALL
# 참석자로 등록된 개인일정 SELECT E.EventID, E.FolderType FROM covi_smart4j.EVENT AS E LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.EVENT AS LE ON E.LinkEventID = LE.EventID AND LE.DeleteDate IS NULL LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.EVENT_DATE AS ED ON LE.EventID = ED.EventID INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER AS FD ON E.FolderID = FD.FolderID AND FD.FolderType = 'Schedule.Person' AND FD.DeleteDate IS NULL WHERE LEFT(#{localCurrentDate}, 10) BETWEEN ED.StartDate AND ED.EndDate
AND E.FolderID IN
#{item}
AND E.DeleteDate IS NULL AND E.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND E.OwnerCode = #{userID} AND E.EventType = 'A'
UNION ALL
# 개인일정 제외하고 SELECT E.EventID, E.FolderType FROM covi_smart4j.EVENT AS E LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.EVENT_DATE AS ED ON E.EventID = ED.EventID INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER AS FD ON E.FolderID = FD.FolderID AND FD.FolderType <> 'Schedule.Person' AND FD.DeleteDate IS NULL WHERE LEFT(#{localCurrentDate}, 10) BETWEEN ED.StartDate AND ED.EndDate
AND E.FolderID IN
#{item}
AND E.DeleteDate IS NULL AND E.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND FD.FolderType LIKE 'Schedule%' # 개인일정 공유 이벤트 UNION ALL
SELECT E.EventID, E.FolderType FROM covi_smart4j.EVENT AS E INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER AS FD ON FD.FolderType = 'Schedule.Share' INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.EVENT_SHARE AS ES ON ES.SpecifierCode = E.OwnerCode AND ES.TargetCode = #{userID} INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.EVENT_DATE AS ED ON E.EventID = ED.EventID WHERE E.FolderType = 'Schedule.Person' AND LEFT(#{localCurrentDate}, 10) BETWEEN ED.StartDate AND ED.EndDate AND E.DeleteDate IS NULL AND E.IsDisplay = 'Y' ) AS A WHERE FolderType LIKE '%Schedule%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.SurveyID , A.SurveyStartDate AS D_SurveyStartDate , A.SurveyEndDate AS D_SurveyEndDate , Fn_SurveyTargetRespondent_R(A.SurveyID,#{userID}) AS IsTargetRespondent FROM covi_smart4j.survey AS A LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.survey_respondent AS B ON A.SurveyID = B.SurveyID AND B.RespondentCode = #{userID} WHERE A.State = 'F' AND B.SurveyID IS NULL AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL AND CommunityID = 0 ) AS Proc WHERE Proc.IsTargetRespondent = 'Y' AND D_SurveyStartDate <= #{localCurrentDate} AND D_SurveyEndDate >= #{localCurrentDate}
